thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Opera Liege - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly and helpful
thread.title_full: Friendly and helpful - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Opera Liege, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Marcjcohen
title: Friendly and helpful
text:
I had read a few reviews prior to booking the hotel and it was mixed with positive and negative.
I have only positive comments. The staff were warm and friendly, they helped with preparing baby food in the middle of the night and made the stay for the family easy and comfortable. The room was just about right with a squeeze to fit the baby cot upstairs and perfect for the toddler downstairs. Am happy to recommend and stay there again!
